title: wine_Hitching_Post_2006_Cargasacchi_Vineyard_Pinot_Noir_(Sta._Rita_Hills)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 112806.
country: US.
description: Has this vineyard ever produced anything less than a spectacular Pinot Noir? Hitching Post's '06 showcases its exotic spiciness and the way its power is modulated with an elegant structure. Cloves, nutmeg, allspice and white pepper are just a few of the spices that tantalize the cherry, orange and cola flavors. The wine feels wonderful in the mouth, rich and long-lasting. Ageable, too, with a window extending beyond 2012..
designation: Cargasacchi Vineyard.
points: 94.
